se350.elevatorSim.person

Class PersonImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • se350.elevatorSim.person.PersonImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Person

    public class PersonImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Person
    An implementation of the Person interface that creates a simple person who starts on one floor and desires to go to another floor through an elevator instance.
    Author:
    Shahzaib Syed

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface se350.elevatorSim.person.Person

          int source,
          int dest)
           throws InvalidParameterException
        Constructor to create a simple Person object
        Parameters:
        id - - The unique id for a Simple Person
        dest - - The floor that the Person wants to get to
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if the destination is outside the number of floors.
